snippet.title: Couch Monsters - Trailer (Couch Coop Indiegame)
snippet.description:
Wishlist now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1530630/Couch_Monsters/
Wishlists are super important for Indies. Every Wishlist helps a ton! :D

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/couchMonsters
Presskit: https://bit.ly/OurPresskit
Write us: couchmonsters(at)posteo(dot)de

Cute monsters with portals in their mouths - whatever one monster eats, the other spits out!
Couch Monsters is a light-hearted Couch Co-op puzzlegame for two people. As the titular Couch Monsters you have to solve tricky physics puzzles to reach and sit down on some comfortable couches.
